title: G support said they knew nothing about the extended 1 year battery Pixel 4XL program. Anyone else?
content:
No one at support understood how to execute the article (https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/10169830?hl=en) . Escalated 5 times over 3 hours... 

They eventually said it was iBreakuFix's problem (its not). I ended up paying - anyone else find a way through?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
